pages.title: Black Wildebeest
pages.text: The black wildebeest or white-tailed gnu ($(o)Connochaetes gnou$()) is one of the two closely related wildebeest species.$(br2)It is a member of the genus Connochaetes and family Bovidae.$(br2)It was first described in 1780 by Eberhard August Wilhelm von Zimmermann.

pages.title: Black Wildebeest
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: None Days
